scify.menu.title: SciFy Menu
scify.menu.health.title: Custom Health
scify.menu.fish.title: Fishing Notifications
scify.menu.welcome.title: Auto Welcome
scify.menu.welcome.description: Automatically sends "wb" when a player joins.
scify.menu.watermark.title: Show Watermark
scify.menu.watermark.description: Enable/Disable the small text in the bottom right displaying the mod name.
scify.menu.resourcepack.title: Toggle Resource Pack
scify.menu.forcemod.title: ADVANCED: Force enable mod features
scify.menu.forcemod.description: Disables the requirement to be on a Dungeonfy server. This means the features work on every server. This is not recommended.
